children.text:
Choose one of the sounds available on the menu. There are nine options available: womb, hair dryer, shower, white noise, heartbeat, rain, plastic, radio and breath.

After choosing the sound put the phone to your baby and tap the button Play to play the sound. If your device has an accelerometer can also shake to start or stop playing.

If you prefer you can use the configuration options under the Play button.

The checkboxes determine how the application behaves. If you want, for example, the app will continue playing after closed just check the corresponding box.

The other options are Play sound continuously and Detect the baby's crying.

In the first case, if it is not checked, the sound will stop playing after some time.

The other option is less obvious, and means that the app will be listening to the device's microphone and is automatically activated if the baby starts to cry.

The noise sensitivity level can be adjusted by the bar below. The more left the score is, the higher the sensitivity.



For tips, news and other information, visit the blog by tapping the top side of the bar help button.
